creditline: Mary Griggs Burke Collection, gift of the Mary and Jackson Burke Foundation
description: 108 shikishi distributed over 2 screens; chapters 1-27 on right screen, 28-54 on left screen. Calligraphy by various courtiers whose names are inscribed on slips of paper next to the text shikishi.
medium: ink, red ink and gold on paper
title: Fifty-four Scenes from the Tale of Genji
